title: Fix ARAM's RIot
body: ARAM's are broken in the sense its NOT RANDOM!! you know the main reason for playing all RANDOM  all mid allowing people to reroll, and not harsh punishments on dodging ruins the games, if someone dodges in a game everyone who doesnt dodge should keep their champs and stay on the same teams only the 1 new person you need should get a new champion because so many times you get a pretty fun and decent team and the enemy will just dodge take the 10min penalty or switch to another account
